imdb.title: Leadale no Daichi nite
imdb.plot: New beginnings in familiar lands. After a horrific accident put her on life support, the last vestige of freedom Keina Kagami had was in the VRMMORPG World of Leadale. When she wakes up in the body of her game avatar, though, Kein...

episodes.title: An Inn, a Tower, a Bear, and a Banquet
episodes.plot: On Earth, in a Japanese hospital, permanently disabled patient Keina Kagami dies when her life support fails in a massive power outage. To her immense surprise, she awakens in the world of Leadale, the setting of the virtual reality role-playing game she had been using to interact with the rest of the world, as her avatar, the high elf mage Cayne. From the proprietors of the inn in which she awakens, she is shocked to learn that 200 years have passed since she last entered the game, and that the White Kingdom of Felstes and Green Kingdom of Gruskeilo - the settings ...

episodes.title: A Daughter, A Colosseum, Losing Control, and an Uppercut
episodes.plot: Cayna visited the place where her daughter, Mai-Mai, now works. And as shocking news reveals to her that she's the only player left in the role-playing game, what will her ecstatic son, Lord Skargo, now attempt to do?
